name: Moonlight Minions
description: Moonlight Minions is an addictive tower-defense experience with a refreshing style. Defend your lands from the invading minion hordes using the arsenal of organic defenses and powerful abilities at your disposal! Originally released for iOS, Moonlight Minions is now available on Steam.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.6GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia Geforce® 5600 or better Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: In fact, it's not a bad game, but a td finished in less than 4 hours with all achievements is a bit sad. All I can tell you is that I enjoyed it, but, again, for 4 hours. So, from my point of view, I can make a positive review because I got what I expected nevertheless if you are hoping to find a very good td in that game go away.
this is what we like to call a 'failure' why even put this on steam? much less charge money for such a heap of crap...
